channel.title: nodeJS on web with mizouzie

item.title: Energy Price News API
item.description: Energy Price News API A project to create a public API that scrapes news sites for anything concerning the changes in energy prices. This project’s secondary aim is to help beginners learn how to contribute to open source projects and will be purposely kept as basic as possible. Up to date version hosted at: RapidAPI Hub Click here to see the site! Original Idea This project was first thought up after watching this video by Ania Kub√≥w, so many thanks to her for the inspiration.
